ComicInfo.Summary:
A CLASSIC GAME OF CAT AND...SYMBIOTE?
Black Cat has to steal from Knull himself!
If you know Felicia Hardy, she never shows up inappropriately dressed - THIS ISSUE, Felicia gets her own ANTI-VENOM COSTUME!
